page.title: 01North Abingdon Area
page.content: Our D Block is covered by a large area of farmland, one village and many residential areas. The village of Sunningwell is of historical and architectural interest and has a 13th century church. The residential areas include many recent developments and R.A.F. Abingdon housing estates. Several schools are in the area including Sunningwell Primary School, Dunmore Infant and Junior School, Rush Common Primary School, Fitzharrys Secondary School and Abingdon College of Further Education. There is also Radley College, a public school for boys, and the Manor Preparatory School. The Abingdon bypass goes through the area. It was opened in September l973 and has greatly eased traffic congestion in the town.
